name: 3D Hoverboard Racing Simulator - eXtreme Hover Board Skateboarding Games 2
name_original: 3D Hoverboard Racing Simulator - eXtreme Hover Board Skateboarding Games 2
description:
Grab your hoverboard and hit the streets! Twist, turn, and race your way and avoid all the obstacles that are coming your way. Featuring super easy controls and a rocking sound track, you'll be left wanting more!

FEATURES

- Simple controls!
- Lots of fun obstacles!
- Fun soundtrack!
